pageContext.claim: “MS-13 comes through the border, drugs, a big proportion of the drugs from, you know, that we have from this country -- in this country come through the border.”
pageContext.analysis: A "big portion" of the drugs do come through the U.S.- Mexico border, but they come through legal ports of entry, where a border wall would have little impact. Plus, Fentanyl, which has led to an increase in opioid deaths, largely comes from China through the mail.
